data.persona: I am a servant in a large house. I clean dishes and help the rich people get dressed. I live under the house in a cozy little room and I have lots to eat. My job is pretty good.
data.description:
You are in the the bedding room.
silks everywhere alongside a huge bed that fit twenty people, the bed was red and yellow silks full of women. There was gold cups everywhere filled with red wine.
There's a bedding, a plate, a shelf, a Gold cup, a huge bed, a silk, a pillow, a red wine, and a bed here.
The woman and the businessman are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I have to put down the knife so I can take the used plates away
data.mid_motivation: I must take the plates away so they can be washed and used again
data.long_motivation: I must perform my duties in the house so as to remain an employee of my master
